title: Hyper Focusing
description: The character chooses a hyperfocus activity. They gain +5 to any rolls associated with it, but suffer –5 to any other activity.

title: Timing Out
description: The character needs to take a break. They spend a whole Time Track reset trying to calm themself.

title: Anxiety
description: The character feels overwhelmed by the current events, suffering –2 to all checks.

title: Binging or Hyperventilating
description: If aboard a ship, the character attempts to distract themself by eating until they can’t take another bite (–D6 Rations). If exploring, the character starts hyperventilating, rapidly consuming oxygen before they manage to calm themself (–D4 Oxygen Pellets).

title: Getting Overwhelmed
description: The character is starting to reach their limit and is feeling less and less secure. Their Resolve checks are at –2 for the rest of the mission.
